goals.description: Explore desired and viable vision for a curated recipe creator marketplace with instant purchase as meal kit 'fulfilled by HelloFresh'
Transform HelloFresh into the 'Spotify for food' - a platform where any creator can share a recipe that HelloFresh fulfills

key_results.target: Completed MVP ready for handover January 2026
Validated curated recipe creator marketplace with two segments (influencers and aggregators)

in_scope: Curated recipe creator marketplace (1. influencer, 2. Aggregators)
Instant purchase as meal kit 'fulfilled by HelloFresh'
User research with prospects and actives
Stakeholder alignment and gated decision reviews
deprioritized: Markets beyond Canada in initial phase

dependencies: Marketing Team HF Canada - influencer campaign for 2026
Project DAU - Cookbook library feature and recipe conversion tool
AI Matching Feature team (Imran Uddin) - recipe matching algorithm
SEO/GEO team - recipe development pages system
Engineering team handover (Leo Lee and team TBD)
Operations team for SKU management (Georgiana Ciobotaru, Danielle Boucher)
Bryan Altman for influencer outreach support
Growth Marketing CA (Cole Banning, James Griesser)

risks.risk: Competitors already solving the problem (Instacart partnerships with influencers and Pinterest)
risks.mitigation: Act with urgency; differentiate with holistic recipe offering and direct delivery vs individual food items
Email outreach template created; Bryan Altman's team available for support if low response rates

risks.risk: Team availability - key members OOO during critical sprints
risks.mitigation: Interim coverage (Andrea Henry as consulting partner, Linnea Siersma for operations)

risks.risk: Parallel initiatives may create confusion or duplication
risks.mitigation: Regular coordination with Marketing Team Canada, Project DAU, and other teams; separate project execution with information sharing

initiatives: Marketing campaign with influencers in Canada 2026 (parallel initiative)
User research studies with prospects and actives
